official_title: Shared Decision Making in Rural Primary Care Lung Cancer Screening and Smoking Cessation
inclusion_criteria:
* Asymptomatic to lung cancer symptoms
* Tobacco smoking history of 20+ pack-years
* Current smoker or quit within last 15 years
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 50 Years
Must have maximum age of 80 Years
exclusion_criteria: - A patient that does not meet inclusion criteria
